## Overview

`plotr` is an R package designed to provide quick and easy access to commonly used plotting functions in data analysis.

## Installation

You can install `plotr` using the [`remotes`](https://github.com/r-lib/remotes) package:

``` {r}
#| eval: false

remotes::install_github("danielvartan/plotr")
```
